00020 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
00021 #define CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
00022 
00023 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/function.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include <string>
00028 
00031 namespace clpp {
00032 
00035 namespace detail {
00036 
00042 template< typename ArgType >
00043 struct argument_holder {
00044     typedef boost::function< void ( const ArgType& /* value */ ) >
00045             user_function_with_arg;
00046 public:
00047     explicit argument_holder( void (*fn)( const ArgType& ) ) :
00048             func_with_arg( fn ) {}
00049 
00050     explicit argument_holder( void (*fn)( ArgType ) ) :
00051             func_with_arg( fn ) {}
00052 
00053     template< typename Object >
00054     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00055             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00056     
00057     template< typename Object >
00058     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( const ArgType& ) const ) :
00059             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00060     
00061     template< typename Object >
00062     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( ArgType ) ) :
00063             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00064 
00065     template< typename Object >
00066     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) :
00067             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00068 public:
00069     user_function_with_arg  func_with_arg;
00070     ArgType                 default_value;
00071 };
00072 
00073 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< bool > >                b_arg_p;
00074 
00075 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< char > >                c_arg_p;
00076 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed char > >         sc_arg_p;
00077 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned char > >       uc_arg_p;
00078 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< const char* > >         cca_arg_p;
00079 
00080 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< int > >                 i_arg_p;
00081 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed int > >          si_arg_p;
00082 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned int > >        ui_arg_p;
00083 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< short int > >           shi_arg_p;
00084 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< long int > >            li_arg_p;
00085 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned long int > >   uli_arg_p;
00086 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned short int > >  ushi_arg_p;
00087 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed long int > >     sli_arg_p;
00088 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed short int > >    sshi_arg_p;
00089 
00090 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< float > >               f_arg_p;
00091 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< double > >              d_arg_p;
00092 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< long double > >         ld_arg_p;
00093 
00094 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< std::string > >         s_arg_p;
00095 
00096 } // namespace detail
00097 } // namespace clpp

00099 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
